languages.text: "Последуем совету Ирлиэт. Пустите среди вандалов слух о какой-то великой ценности. Когда они передерутся, устройте облаву и разбейте их".
"We will follow Yrliet's advice. Spread rumours about a great prize of some sort among the Vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, conduct a raid and finish them off."
languages.original_text: "Последуем совету Ирлиэт. Пустите среди вандалов слух о какой-то великой ценности. Когда они передерутся, устройте облаву и разбейте их".

traits.locale_text: "We shall follow Yrliet's advice. We shall spread a rumour about something valuable among the vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, you shall raid and finish them.
"We shall follow Yrliet's advice. We shall spread a rumour about something valuable among the vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, you shall raid and finish them.

"We shall follow Yrliet's advice. Let us spread rumours about certain valuables in the possession of the vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, you shall conduct a raid and finish them off.

"We shall follow Yrliet's advice. Let us spread rumours about certain valuables in the possession of the vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, you shall conduct a raid and finish them off.
"We will follow Yrliet's advice. Spread rumours about a great prize of some sort among the Vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, conduct a raid and finish them off."
"We will follow Yrliet's advice. Spread rumours about a great prize of some sort among the Vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, conduct a raid and finish them off."

languages.text: “我们准备听从伊莉耶特的建议。散布谣言，说一部分引擎破坏者手中藏着贵重物品。等他们自相残杀完之后，我们再出其不意，将他们一举剿灭。”
languages.original_text: "We will follow Yrliet's advice. Spread rumours about a great prize of some sort among the Vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, conduct a raid and finish them off."

traits.locale_text: “我们准备听从伊莉耶特的建议。散布谣言，说一部分引擎破坏者手中藏着贵重物品。等他们自相残杀完之后，我们再出其不意，将他们一举剿灭。”

languages.text: «Seguiremos el consejo de Yrliet. Haga correr rumores entre los vándalos sobre la llegada de un gran botín. Cuando acaben de luchar entre ellos, lleve a cabo una incursión y acabe con ellos».
languages.original_text: "We will follow Yrliet's advice. Spread rumours about a great prize of some sort among the Vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, conduct a raid and finish them off."

traits.locale_text: «Seguiremos el consejo de Yrliet. Haga correr rumores entre los vándalos sobre la llegada de un gran botín. Cuando acaben de luchar entre ellos, lleve a cabo una incursión y acabe con ellos».

languages.text: 「ユリエットの助言に従おう。破壊者が所有する特定の貴重品についての噂を流そうじゃないか。そして、奴らの内部での争いが終わったら、奴らに急襲をかけ、とどめを刺すのだ」
languages.original_text: "We will follow Yrliet's advice. Spread rumours about a great prize of some sort among the Vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, conduct a raid and finish them off."

traits.locale_text: 「ユリエットの助言に従おう。破壊者が所有する特定の貴重品についての噂を流そうじゃないか。そして、奴らの内部での争いが終わったら、奴らに急襲をかけ、とどめを刺すのだ」
「ユリエットの助言に従おう。破壊者が所有する特定の貴重品についての噂を流そうじゃないか。そして、奴らの内部での争いが終わったら、奴らに急襲をかけ、とどめを刺すのだ」

languages.text: « Nous suivrons le conseil d'Yrliet. Faisons courir chez les Vandales la rumeur de quelque fabuleuse récompense, quand ils auront fini de s'entretuer, vous lancerez une attaque pour les achever. »
languages.original_text: "We will follow Yrliet's advice. Spread rumours about a great prize of some sort among the Vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, conduct a raid and finish them off."

traits.locale_text: « Nous suivrons le conseil d'Yrliet. Faisons courir chez les Vandales la rumeur de quelque fabuleuse récompense, quand ils auront fini de s'entretuer, vous lancerez une attaque pour les achever. »

languages.text: "Wir werden Yrliets Rat befolgen. Bringt Gerüchte über irgendeinen großen Preis unter den Vandalen in Umlauf. Und wenn sie sich gegenseitig dezimiert haben, führt Ihr eine Razzia durch und gebt ihnen den Rest."
languages.original_text: "We will follow Yrliet's advice. Spread rumours about a great prize of some sort among the Vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, conduct a raid and finish them off."

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden Yrliets Rat befolgen. Bringt Gerüchte über irgendeinen großen Preis unter den Vandalen in Umlauf. Und wenn sie sich gegenseitig dezimiert haben, führt Ihr eine Razzia durch und gebt ihnen den Rest."

"Wir befolgen Yrliets Rat. Verbreiten wir Gerüchte über bestimmte Wertgegenstände, die sich im Besitz der Vandalen befinden. Und wenn sie sich genügend untereinander bekriegt haben, dann führt Ihr eine Razzia durch und gebt ihnen den Rest.

languages.text: "Yrliet'in tavsiyesine uyacağız. Vandallar arasında bir tür büyük ödüle dair söylentiler yayın. Kendi aralarındaki savaşları sona erdiğinde de bir baskın düzenleyerek işlerini bitirin."
languages.original_text: "We will follow Yrliet's advice. Spread rumours about a great prize of some sort among the Vandals. And when they are done fighting among themselves, conduct a raid and finish them off."
